definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to listen to the next chapter for an explanation
pinyin: qie3 ting1 xia4 hui2 fen1 jie3

sentences.english: I hope he can see the movie next time.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他下回能看這部影片。

sentences.english: The main correlational language cortex included left temporal lobe and bilateral inferior frontal gyrus.
sentences.chinese: 主要語言相關皮層區爲左顳葉及雙側額下回。

sentences.english: For avoiding a too long article, please read the next part.
sentences.chinese: 爲避免一篇文章過長，且看下回分解。

sentences.english: Team incentives in situations other than sales jobs are discussed next.
sentences.chinese: 團隊激勵的其他情況且聽下回分解。

sentences.english: Wish you would have told me that in the first place, ya big mouthed moron.
sentences.chinese: 希望你下回能上來就告訴我，你這個大嘴混蛋。

sentences.english: when we turn to the question of affirmative action next time.
sentences.chinese: 我們要講的反歧視行動問題的探討，下回分解。

sentences.english: The Sparrow's for trial, at next bird assizes .
sentences.chinese: 下回鳥兒法庭，受審者爲麻雀。

sentences.english: If you want to know what happened afterwards, read the next chapter.
sentences.chinese: 欲知後事如何，且聽下回分解。

sentences.english: I’d dare to make more mistakes next time.
sentences.chinese: 下回我會敢於多犯些錯誤。

sentences.english: We won't let you off so easily next time.
The Sparrow's for trial, At next bird assizes .
sentences.chinese: 下回小鳥審判，受審者爲麻雀。
也許下回我們就知道了。

sentences.english: Jim said he reckoned I would believe him next time.
sentences.chinese: 傑姆說，他估摸，下回我會信他的話。

sentences.english: Should know that side, and listen to the next time decomposition.
sentences.chinese: 要知端的，再聽下回分解。

definition: in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
erhua variant of 等一會|等一会[deng3 yi1 hui4]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
